Class ActivityStateMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcore.StateMachine
      • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcore.ActivityStateMachine

  • public class ActivityStateMachine
extends StateMachine
    Handles the state for an activity instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean begin()
      Sets the state from the activity instance specified in attributes from ready to running.
      boolean disableData()
      Disables the data flow for the activity instance specified in attributes.
      boolean enableControlFlow()
      Enables the control flow for the activity instance specified in attributes.
      boolean enableData()
      Enables the data flow for the activity instance specified in attributes.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Checks if the state ist enabled
      boolean referenceStarted()
      Sets the state from the activity instance specified in attributes to referential running.
      boolean referenceTerminated()
      Sets the state from the activity instance specified in attributes from referential running to terminated.
      boolean skip()
      Sets the state from the activity instance specified in attributes to skipped.
      boolean terminate()
      Sets the state from the activity instance specified in attributes from running to terminated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActivityStateMachine

        public ActivityStateMachine(int activityInstance_id,
                    ScenarioInstance scenarioInstance,
                    ControlNodeInstance controlNodeInstance)
        Creates and initialize a activity state machine for an activity. Reads the state from the database of the activity and add the activity to the correct lists in scenario instance.
        Parameters:
        activityInstance_id - This is the database id from the activity instance.
        scenarioInstance - This is an instance from the class ScenarioInstance.
        controlNodeInstance - This is an instance from the class ControlNodeInstance.

    • Method Detail

      • enableControlFlow

        public boolean enableControlFlow()
        Enables the control flow for the activity instance specified in attributes.
        Returns:
        true if the state could been updated. false if the state couldn't been updated.

      • enableData

        public boolean enableData()
        Enables the data flow for the activity instance specified in attributes.
        Returns:
        true if the state could been updated. false if the state couldn't been updated.

      • disableData

        public boolean disableData()
        Disables the data flow for the activity instance specified in attributes.
        Returns:
        true if the state could been updated. false if the state couldn't been updated.

      • referenceStarted

        public boolean referenceStarted()
        Sets the state from the activity instance specified in attributes to referential running.
        Returns:
        true if the state could been set to referential running. false if the state couldn't been set.

      • referenceTerminated

        public boolean referenceTerminated()
        Sets the state from the activity instance specified in attributes from referential running to terminated.
        Returns:
        true if the state could been set to referential running. false if the state couldn't been set.

      • begin

        public boolean begin()
        Sets the state from the activity instance specified in attributes from ready to running.
        Returns:
        true if the state could been set to running. false if the state couldn't been set.

      • terminate

        public boolean terminate()
        Sets the state from the activity instance specified in attributes from running to terminated.
        Specified by:
        terminate in class StateMachine
        Returns:
        true if the state could been set to terminated. false if the state couldn't been set.

      • skip

        public boolean skip()
        Sets the state from the activity instance specified in attributes to skipped.
        Specified by:
        skip in class StateMachine
        Returns:
        true if the state could been set. false if the state couldn't been set.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Checks if the state ist enabled
        Returns:
        true if the state is ready, ready(ControlFlow) or ready(data).
